package xiangmu;
public class Ceshi {
    public static void main(String args[]) {
        // 标志变量法判断质数
        // 质数：只能被 1 和 自己 整除的正整数
        int shuzi = 97;
        int biaozhi = 0;
        for(int i=2; i<shuzi; i++) {
            if(shuzi % i == 0) {
                biaozhi = 1;
                break;
            }
        }
        if(biaozhi == 0) {
            System.out.println(shuzi + "是一个质数！");
        }else {
            System.out.println(shuzi + "不是质数！");
        }
    }
} 
97是一个质数！
